body: BTW: its silly to assume "I know what I'm doing". Sure, I have a Mac. I also have a Windows box and use a remote Ubuntu system. I develop platform independent code (more or less) so I have never heard of CoreFoundation.h before. @quentinmit obviously know more about Apple software setup than I do, and of course about go and its tools. I do know something about custom service though .. I always support my customers, not dismiss their issues without investigation.
